Package org.apache.sis.gui.metadata

package org.apache.sis.gui.metadata
Widgets about metadata. Those widgets can show a Metadata instance in a tree, or show a summary of those metadata in an "overview" panel.
Since:
1.1

    Description
    MetadataSummary
    A panel showing a summary of metadata.
    MetadataTree
    A view of metadata represented by a Tree­Table.
